Andrea Blasco {.description}
=============

Andrea Blasco is a research fellow at [Harvard University Institute for Quantitative Social Science (IQSS)][iqss] and member of the [Crowd Innovation Laboratory (CIL)][cil] at Harvard University. Blasco is an applied economist focusing on intellectual property rights, innovation contests, crowdsourcing, and media economics. For more information, see his curriculum vitae.

[iqss]: http://www.iq.harvard.edu
[cil]: http://projects.iq.harvard.edu/crowdinnovationlab
